column2:
**gln** (required) String - GLN of your own Company;
OR
**guid** (required) String - unique identifier of your own Company

**status_id** (optonal) int - document folder id:

* 0 - All
* 1 - Inbox;
* 2 - Outbox;
* 3 - Archive;
* 4 - Drafts;
* 5 - Important.

**family** (опціонально) String - назва сімейства документів:

* edi
* uzd
* certificats
* ats
* ettn
* distribex
* simple-doc (Vilnyi)
* tender
* agreement
* openprice (Have Product)
In the body of the request method transmitted `required and optional search/filtering criterias <https://wiki.edin.ua/en/latest/integration_2_0/APIv2/Methods/EveryBody/StorageQuery.html>`__
